job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Designation: Project Tech. Lead (4A): 5 – 7 YearsProject Manager/Architect (4B/5A): 7 – 10 Years&nbsp;Role and responsibilities·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Project Management (50%)·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Front Door (Requirements, Metadata collection, classification & security clearance)·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data pipeline template development·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data pipeline Monitoring development & support (operations)·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Design, develop, deploy, and maintain production-grade scalable data transformation, machine learning and deep learning code, pipelines; manage data and model versioning, training, tuning, serving, experiment and evaluation tracking dashboards.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Manage ETL and machine learning model lifecycle: develop, deploy, monitor, maintain, and update data and models in production.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build and maintain tools and infrastructure for data processing for AI/ML development initiatives.&nbsp;Technical skills requirementsThe candidate must demonstrate proficiency in,·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience deploying machine learning models into production environment.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong DevOps, Data Engineering and ML background with Cloud platforms·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in containerization and orchestration (such as Docker, Kubernetes)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with ML training/retraining, Model Registry, ML model performance measurement using ML Ops open source frameworks.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building/operating systems for data extraction, ingestion and processing of large data sets·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with MLOps tools such as MLFlow and Kubeflow·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience in Python scripting·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with CI/CD·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fluency in Python data tools e.g. Pandas, Dask, or Pyspark·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience working on large scale, distributed systems·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Python/Scala for data pipelines·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Scala/Java/Python for micro-services and APIs·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HDP, Oracle skills & Sql; Spark, Scala, Hive and Oozie DataOps (DevOps, CDC)&nbsp;Nice-to-have skills·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jenkins, K8S·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Google Cloud certification·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unix or Shell scripting
